title: I Should Have Just Died - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Ancient Times   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Blackmail   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   European Ambience   Family   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Living Arrangements   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Loneliness   Loner Protagonist   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Royalty   Secret Identity   Servants   Tragic Past
author: Lina   린아(潾娥)
description:
There was a woman. Born as an illegitimate child and raised under the strict control of the queen, her world was as small as a well.

There was a man. He was forced to marry a woman who was his brother's political marriage partner. His world, which was infinitely wide, became smaller.

The woman’s original sin, and the man’s resentment. “I should have just died instead...”>
